mapper.insert: insert into `user` (username, password, nickname, open_id, access_token, subscribe, remark, sex, headimgurl, subscribe_time, unsubscribe_time, becomeVip_time, totalPoint, cardNumber, vipLevel) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{openId}, #{accessToken}, #{subscribe}, #{remark}, #{sex}, #{headimgurl}, #{subscribeTime}, #{unsubscribeTime}, #{becomevipTime}, #{totalpoint}, #{cardnumber}, #{viplevel})
mapper.update: update `user` set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, open_id = #{openId}, access_token = #{accessToken}, subscribe = #{subscribe}, remark = #{remark}, sex = #{sex}, headimgurl = #{headimgurl}, subscribe_time = #{subscribeTime}, unsubscribe_time = #{unsubscribeTime}, becomeVip_time = #{becomevipTime}, totalPoint = #{totalpoint}, cardNumber = #{cardnumber}, vipLevel = #{viplevel} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, nickname, open_id, access_token, subscribe, remark, sex, headimgurl, subscribe_time, unsubscribe_time, becomeVip_time, totalPoint, cardNumber, vipLevel from `user` where id = #{id}
select id, username, password, nickname, open_id, access_token, subscribe, remark, sex, headimgurl, subscribe_time, unsubscribe_time, becomeVip_time, totalPoint, cardNumber, vipLevel from `user`
